Name: Drunken Dad Simulator
About the game: Video games let us take on the role of great generals, brave adventurers or cunning agents. This game, on the other hand, lets you slip into the skin of an alcoholic brown bear whose only goal is to get wasted at any cost. Make sure you have an unforgettable kid's birthday party in this surprising dad simulator and find all the hidden beer bottles. A tool tailor-made to confront your childhood traumas and at the same time adequately prepare young parents for their role as guardians. Features: lovely, colorful, hand-made graphics exhilarating music invigorating gameplay
